com.ae.apps.lib.contacts

Interface AeContactManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractContactManager, ContactManager, ContactManagerProxy

    public interface AeContactManager
    A specification for a ContactManager used in AE App lab projects 
         Call @link{fetchAllContacts} or @link{fetchAllContactsAsync} to initialize the contacts

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fetchAllContacts()
      Invoke to fetch all contacts and use them right away
      void fetchAllContactsAsync(ContactDataConsumer consumer)
      Invoke to fetch contacts in a separate thread.
      java.util.List<ContactInfo> getAllContacts()
      Invoke to fetch all contacts once read from are read.
      java.lang.String getContactIdFromAddress(java.lang.String address)
      Does a lookup on the contacts by phone number lookup
      long getContactIdFromRawContactId(java.lang.String rawContactId)
      Returns the contactId based on the rawContactId
      ContactInfo getContactInfo(java.lang.String contactId)
      Returns the contact info
      java.util.List<MessageInfo> getContactMessages(java.lang.String contactId)
      Returns the list of messages for this contact with id
      android.graphics.Bitmap getContactPhoto(java.lang.String contactId)
      Returns a Bitmap object for the contact's photo
      android.graphics.Bitmap getContactPhoto(java.lang.String contactId, android.graphics.Bitmap defaultImage)
      Returns a Bitmap object for the contact's photo, returning a default image
      ContactInfo getContactWithPhoneDetails(java.lang.String contactId)
      Returns a contact with phone details
      ContactInfo getRandomContact()
      Returns a random contactVo from the list if the list is non empty, null otherwise
      int getTotalContactCount()
      Gets the total contacts read

    • Method Detail

      • fetchAllContacts

        void fetchAllContacts()
        Invoke to fetch all contacts and use them right away

      • fetchAllContactsAsync

        void fetchAllContactsAsync(ContactDataConsumer consumer)
        Invoke to fetch contacts in a separate thread. Use if lazily creating an instance of @link{AeContactManager}
        Parameters:
        consumer - consumer to be notified when the contacts have been read

      • getAllContacts

        java.util.List<ContactInfo> getAllContacts()
                                    throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Invoke to fetch all contacts once read from are read. Returns a copy of the contacts list. Note that this is an expensive operation as a new list is created with original values and returned to the caller.
        Returns:
        contacts list
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - unless implemented

      • getTotalContactCount

        int getTotalContactCount()
        Gets the total contacts read
        Returns:
        number of contacts

      • getRandomContact

        ContactInfo getRandomContact()
        Returns a random contactVo from the list if the list is non empty, null otherwise
        Returns:
        a ContactVo object

      • getContactWithPhoneDetails

        ContactInfo getContactWithPhoneDetails(java.lang.String contactId)
        Returns a contact with phone details
        Parameters:
        contactId - contact id
        Returns:
        contact vo

      • getContactPhoto

        android.graphics.Bitmap getContactPhoto(java.lang.String contactId,
                                        android.graphics.Bitmap defaultImage)
        Returns a Bitmap object for the contact's photo, returning a default image
        Parameters:
        contactId - contact id
        defaultImage - default image
        Returns:
        contact photo
